app-desc: The lightweight YouTube experience for Android.
A free, secure and open source app for Android to manage your 2-step verification tokens.

Organic Maps is a privacy-first offline maps & GPS app for hiking, cycling, biking, and driving. Absolutely free. No ads. No tracking. Developed with love by the open-source community. Powered by OpenStreetMap data.
A Reddit client on Android written in Java. It does not have any ads and it features a clean UI and smooth browsing experience
Edit encrypted keys and digital identities in a single KeePass file and fill out forms securely.
AntennaPod is a podcast player that is completely open. The app is open-source and you can subscribe to any RSS feed.
Fennec F-Droid is based on the latest Mozilla Firefox release. It has proprietary bits and telemetry removed, but still connects to various Mozilla services that can track users.
